alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Franklin; Gulf; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 7:23PM EDT until April 15 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Central Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Eastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/. * At 722 PM EDT/622 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Marianna to 20 miles west of Chattahoochee to 9 miles southwest of Blountstown to near Wewahitchka to 6 miles west of Port St. Joe, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Blountstown, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Marianna, Chattahoochee, Orange, Franklin, Malone, Sneads, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Bascom, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower and Ocheesee. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
